short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List of ready-to-use special characters. Click to copy to clipboard.
short.es: Lista de caracteres especiales listos para usar. Haga click para copiar al portapapeles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CommonChars is a toolbar button that shows a popup panel with a list of common special characters from non-english languages. Is a tool that lets you easily access special HTML characters without the need to look all over your keyboard or external tools.
